code: import{createContext,useContext,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext(false);export const useAuth=()=>{const auth=useContext(AuthContext);return auth;};export const AuthContextProvider=_ref=>{let{initiallyLogged,children}=_ref;const[isLogged,setIsLogged]=useState(initiallyLogged);const handleLogin=()=>setIsLogged(true);const handleLogout=()=>setIsLogged(false);const authValue={isLogged,onLogout:handleLogout,onLogin:handleLogin};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:authValue,children:children});};
